assignments.name: message
assignments.value:
={{"Gia vang quoc te: "+( $json.result.price )+" USD/ounce" + "	 tuong duong: "+( $json.result.price * $json.result.USD_to_VND / 0.829426 ).toFixed(0)+" VND/1L " +"
" + "Gia vang SJC " + ($json.result.Address) +":
"+"	Mua vao: "+ ($json.result.BuyValue)+" VND/1L" +"
	Ban ra: "+ ($json.result.SellValue)+" VND/1L" +"
"+"Checnh lech gia vang trong nuoc(SJC) so voi quoc te: "+ ($json.result.SellValue - ( $json.result.price * $json.result.USD_to_VND / 0.829426 ).toFixed(0)) + " VND"}}
